install.name: Amplify Contact
install.author: Allan Walker - Amplify
install.description: A slick simple email contact form for Joomla 1.5. This module contact form has validation on the fields and allows you to have a quick contact form loading into a module position on your website. For more Joomla things, please visit http://www.projectamplify.com

param.name: introtext
param.label: Introduction Text
param.description: If you want to, this is where some text will appear (at the top of the form).

param.name: receipt_email
param.label: Email Destination
param.description: Please enter a valid email address where the form will be sent to.

param.name: subject
param.label: Email subject
param.description: Please enter a subject for the email that will be sent.

param.name: thanks
param.label: Thank you Message
param.description: Enter your thank you message which will be displayed after a successful email has been sent.

param.name: error
param.label: Error Message
param.description: Enter your error message which will be displayed if the details are incomplete or form could not send.

param.name: submit_button
param.label: Submit Button Text
param.description: Enter the text you would like to appear on the submit button

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Add a suffix to the module (if you need to) which will allow individual css styling

param.name: credit
param.label: Display credit to the Author?
param.description: Choose to display a small credit notice back to Amplify, the authors of this module.
